content.prompt: What is the effect of putting the word "presumably" (Paragraph 2) in parentheses?

choices.label: To indicate that a possibility is not worth considering
To acknowledge the strength of an opposing viewpoint
To raise doubts about whether an assumption is warranted
To underscore a compelling rationale for an argument

skill.text: Skill 7.C: Explain how grammar and mechanics contribute to the clarity and effectiveness of an argument.
